all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And he who is faithful shall overcome all things, and shall be lifted up at the last day.
Doctrine and Covenants 75:16
Quote of the Day
"The commandments are the path away from pain. And repentance is too"
Sister Tamara W. Runia | 1 Apr 2025General Conference
